Uses of Package
base

  • Packages that use base 
    Package Description
    base  
  • Classes in base used by base 
    Class and Description
    CC_STATE
    CC_State this enum is used for the state of the currentcontroller
    ComPortHandler
    ComPortHandler this class is used as hardware interface for the PCDI, so it sends and receives bytes and notifies the PCDI-Interface
    I_Tab
    I_Tab this is the interface for the tab notifier
    I_Tab_Listener
    I_Tab_Listener this is the interface for the tabs, so it gets notified if the user changes the tab
    PC_STATE
    PC_State this enum is used for the state of the positioncontroller
    PWRST_STATE
    PWRST_STATE this enum is used for the state of the power-stage
    SC_STATE
    SC_State this enum is used for the state of the speedcontroller
    SCOPE_TYPE
    SCOPE_TYPE this enum is used for the scope, wether it is using the fast-scope-mode or a cyclic read mode (slow)
